TopicTitle: *** spoiler *** Vid of the golden arches

Articles.Content:
*** SPOILER ***

If you don\'t know what arches are or where they are and want to discover them yourself, go somewhere else right now!!!!

So I wanted to see if it was possible to do this ... it is. Sorry for the length, it\'s such a perilous journey it was all relevant.

http://youtu.be/3R-qXM9OOdQ

togfox

Master Rocket Scientist

Posts: 666

What sort of devilry lets you drive up walls!?

Anywho, i tried for ages to RCS jump my lander onto the top of an arch, never thought you could just drive up it.

Kerbals not failing..?

Congrats, you drilled some sense into them!
Nice I need to find this arch you speak of

That\'s pretty epic. I stumbled upon the arch as I was burning retrograde at about 25km altitude and spotted something, just a couple odd coloured pixels. I altered course to investigate and there it was. I thought there were only mono . . . munoliths up there. Always fun to discover stuff like this before hearing about it.
